content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the clockwise and counterclockwise paths in the route are exchanged, it will be possible to return to the starting point from the endpoint.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a wall clock. Moving in a clockwise direction from the wall clock, the elements on the path are a howler monkey, a marmot, a king penguin, an Afghan Hound, a bassinet, a chainsaw, a split-rail fence, a crash helmet, and a monitor. Starting from the Afghan Hound, you move around the ring by 10 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

I have been given the following information:

* Starting position: The top dot of the circular path, which is a wall clock.
* Items on the path:
	+ Howler monkey
	+ Marmot
	+ King penguin
	+ Afghan Hound
	+ Bassinet
	+ Chainsaw
	+ Split-rail fence
	+ Crash helmet
	+ Monitor
* Movements: Moving clockwise around the circular path for 10 steps.

Based on this information, my movements will take me to the following items:

* Howler monkey -> Marmot -> King penguin -> Afghan Hound -> Bassinet -> Chainsaw -> Split-rail fence -> Crash helmet -> Monitor -> Top dot (wall clock)

Therefore, I will find the "Monitor" after my movements.
